Welcome to RT2_Assignment!

Indices and tables

First Task

Here there is the documentation of the RT1_II_Assignment!

Node_A Module

This node implements the possibility for the user to give a desired position that the robot must reach

Publishes to:

/position_and_velocity

Subscribes to:

/odom

Clients:

/reaching_goal

scripts.Node_A.action_client()[source]

Function that create an action client, wait the server is active, take input from the user regards to the desired position that the robot must reach, create a goal for the robot and send it to the server

scripts.Node_A.publish_msg(message)[source]

Callback function to set the custom message that will be published

Args: message(Pose)

Node_B Module

This node implements the possibility for the user to see the number of the goal reached from the robot and goal canceled from the user

Services:

/Node_B

Subscribers:

/reaching_goal/result

scripts.Node_B.cb_results(message)[source]

Callback function to check the status of the robot to increment the corresponding counter

scripts.Node_B.data(req)[source]

Function of the Service that returns the value of both counters

Node_C Module

This node calculates 2 values respecting the frequency rate:

  • the distance from the desired position and the current position of the robot

  • the average speed of the robot

Subscribes to:

/position_and_velocity

scripts.Node_C.cb_pos_vel(message)[source]

Callback function of the Subscriber that converts the actual time in milliseconds, with a check it get the current value of coordinates X and Y of the robot and the desired X and Y coordinates, calculates the average speed and the distance from the robot position and the desired position. Finally it shows on the screen the values calculated and update the value of the last time that the informations have been shown on the screen
